title: My Wifi Disconnected While Buying RP
body:
I put in my information and the loading screen for my RP came up, but my wifi went out while it was loading and then came back.

Am I going to get my RP still? Or just lose my money? Or will it not go through at all?

replies.body: Did you check your purchase history on your bank's website and in the game client? This will reveal whether the purchase went through.
if riot got your transaction (they took your money) you will get the RP if not nothing will happen
